zh: 这公寓真不错。

en: I made Ann my secretary.
zh: 我让安当了我的秘书。

en: Ammonia is a colorless liquid or gas with a very strong smell.
zh: 氨是一种无色、有强烈刺激性气味的液体或气体。

en: They were treating me so rudely that I suddenly just lost it.
zh: 他们对我太没礼貌了，我一下子就火了。

en: You shouldn't rely too heavily on the weather report.
zh: 你别太依赖天气预报了。

en: Don't be so greedy.
zh: 别太贪心了。

en: I have neglected you so long that I feel a bit shy in visiting you.
zh: 我太久没联系你了，去见你都觉得有点不好意思了。

en: Ann is exclusive in her choice of friends.
zh: 安在择友方面很挑剔。

en: Anne is the envy of all her friends.
zh: 安所有的朋友都很羡慕她。

en: Ann does not lack for friends.
zh: 安并不缺朋友。

en: Ann sings elegantly.
zh: 安唱歌很优雅。

en: Ann sang a lullaby for her little sister.
zh: 安给妹妹唱了首摇篮曲。

en: Ann has achieved her desired goal.
zh: 安实现了她的目标。

en: Ann seems to be ill.
zh: 安好像生病了。

en: Ann often plays tennis after school.
zh: 安放学后经常打网球。

en: Ann is said to be their leader.
zh: 听说安是他们的头儿。

en: Ann apologized to her teacher for coming to school late.
zh: 安因为上学迟到向老师道歉了。

en: Ann swam across the river.
zh: 安游过了河。

en: Ann is a little girl.
zh: 安是个小女孩。

en: Ann has a kind heart.
zh: 安心地很好。

en: Ann likes to write poems.
zh: 安喜欢写诗。

en: Anne will not come to our party.
zh: 安不来参加我们的聚会了。

en: Ann gave me this present.
zh: 这礼物是安给我的。

en: Ann can't find a job.
zh: 安找不到工作。

en: Anne is patiently knitting.
zh: 安正在耐心地织毛衣。

en: Ann was in a hurry this morning.
zh: 安今天早上挺匆忙的。

en: Ann wrote something on the blackboard.
zh: 安在黑板上写了些东西。

en: Ann came downstairs.
zh: 安下楼来了。

en: Ann must be dreaming a happy dream.
zh: 安一定在做一个美梦。

en: Anne will not accomplish anything.
zh: 安以后肯定一事无成。

en: Ann likes music very much.
zh: 安非常喜欢音乐。

en: Anne accepted Henry's proposal.
zh: 安接受了亨利的求婚。

en: Ann will not come to our party.
zh: 安不来参加我们的聚会了。

en: Ann was long coming.
zh: 安老半天才来。

en: Ann gave an account of how she had escaped.
zh: 安讲述了她是怎么逃出来的。

en: Ann plays tennis very well.
zh: 安网球打得非常好。

en: Ann has a weakness for chocolate.
zh: 安对巧克力没有什么抵抗力。

en: Ann is a cheerleader.
zh: 安是个啦啦队队员。

en: Ann has just finished writing her report.
zh: 安刚写完她的报告。

en: Ann bent her mind to the work.
zh: 安专心投入到了工作中。

en: Ann finished painting the picture.
zh: 安画完了那幅画。

en: Ann was surprised to hear the rumor.
zh: 安听到那个传言挺吃惊的。

en: Ann has a little money with her.
zh: 安身上带了点儿钱。

en: I think Ann loves Jack.
zh: 我觉得安爱上杰克了。

en: I wonder when Anne will come.
zh: 我在想安什么时候会来。

en: Ann always keeps her room clean.
zh: 安总是把房间收拾得很干净。

en: It is said that Anne will get married in June.
zh: 听说安六月份要结婚。

en: Anne lived in terror of being captured by Nazis.
zh: 安一直生活在被纳粹抓走的恐惧中。

en: Which book did you pick out to send to Anne?
zh: 你挑了哪本书送给安？

en: Be nice to Ann.
zh: 对安好点儿。

en: I must apologize to Ann.
zh: 我得去向安道歉。

en: Ann had no friends to play with.
zh: 安没有可以一起玩的朋友。

en: Ann has no sister.
zh: 安没有姐妹。

en: Anne has many admirers.
zh: 安有很多追求者。

en: I can't abide to see such fellows.
zh: 我受不了看到这种家伙。

en: It is unlikely that such a cool headed person got upset.
zh: 像他这么冷静的人，不太可能失态。

en: I cannot abide such people.
zh: 我受不了这种人。

en: I wish I had not bought such a useless thing.
zh: 我真希望没买这么没用的东西。

en: I'm sorry I was so rude.
zh: 对不起，我刚才太没礼貌了。

en: What am I supposed to say when he puts it so logically?
zh: 既然他说得这么有逻辑，我还能说什么呢？

en: You shouldn't have flown out like that.
zh: 你不该那样突然发脾气。

en: He must be crazy to behave like that.
zh: 他做出那种事，一定是疯了。

en: I don't talk to anyone who's that status-conscious.
zh: 我不和那种地位观念太强的人说话。

en: Don't take any notice of those rude boys.
zh: 别理那些没礼貌的小子。

en: Those gloom and doom economists aren't worth their salt.
zh: 那些悲观的经济学家根本没啥真本事。

en: Getting shy Kyoko to talk at a party is like pulling teeth.
zh: 让害羞的京子在派对上开口说话简直太难了。

en: You needn't have helped him with his work.
zh: 你其实没必要帮他干活的。

en: Lending money to such a fellow is as good as throwing it away.
zh: 借钱给那种家伙简直就是打水漂。

en: You're going to fall and sprain your ankle wearing sandals with such huge platforms.
zh: 穿这么厚底的凉鞋，你肯定会摔倒扭伤脚踝的。

en: I like the sound of what he says, but it IS just talk, you know.
zh: 他说得倒挺好听，但他也就是耍耍嘴皮子罢了。

en: I can't bear the sight of him.
zh: 我一看见他就烦。

en: Don't have anything to do with him. He is completely untrustworthy.
zh: 别跟他这种人来往，他这人一点儿都不靠谱。

en: I did wrong in trusting such a fellow.
zh: 我真是看走眼了，居然会相信那种家伙。

en: He should be put in prison.
zh: 他就该被关进监狱。

en: He would sooner rather die than work for that man.
zh: 他宁可死也不愿意给那个人打工。

en: You are crazy to lend money to him.
zh: 你借钱给他，真是疯了。

en: Don't go down before such a man.
zh: 别向那种人低头。

en: How did you come to know such a wonderful girl?
zh: 你是怎么认识这么优秀的女孩的？

en: I can't hold with such a politician.
zh: 我实在没法认同那种政客。

en: That politician put his foot in his mouth when he made those racist comments.
zh: 那个政客发表了那些种族歧视的言论，真是说错话了。

en: Don't associate with such people.
zh: 别跟这种人混。

en: Don't get involved with those people.
zh: 别跟那帮人掺和。

en: There are few if any such kind men.
zh: 像这么好的人，就算有也没几个。

en: No one knows when such a custom first came into existence.
zh: 谁也不知道这种习俗是从什么时候开始有的。

en: He cannot be a gentleman to say such a rude thing.
zh: 能说出这么没礼貌的话，他肯定不是什么绅士。

en: He's completely shunned. I'm surprised he's still working here.
zh: 他都被大家孤立了，真惊讶他居然还在这儿干。

en: He is fortunate having such a good wife.
zh: 他福气真好，娶了这么好的老婆。

en: Such behavior is beneath his dignity.
zh: 做出这种事儿，太掉他身价了。

en: Never did I see such a fool.
zh: 我就没见过这么笨的人。

en: I cannot shed a tear for that horrible man.
zh: 为那种烂人，我一滴眼泪都流不出来。

en: It was stupid of me to make such a mistake.
zh: 我真蠢，竟然犯了这么个错误。

en: How foolish I was not to discover that simple lie!
zh: 我太傻了，竟然没看穿那个简单的谎言！

en: You ought not to have kept her waiting on such a cold night.
zh: 这么冷的天，你不该让她一直等的。

en: He'll have an accident one of these days if he keeps driving like that.
zh: 他要是再这么开车，迟早得出事儿。

en: I can beat him hands down.
zh: 我赢他简直易如反掌。

en: If you trust such a fellow, you'll lose everything you have.
zh: 你要是信那种人，非得赔个精光不可。

en: He must be a fool to talk like that.
zh: 能说出那种话，他肯定是个傻子。

en: Anna married without the knowledge of her parents.
zh: 安娜瞒着父母偷偷结婚了。

en: I'll bet it gives her a feeling of superiority to be so beautiful.
zh: 我敢打赌，长得这么漂亮肯定让她优越感十足。

en: It's unlike him to get so angry.
zh: 发这么大火，可一点儿都不像他。

en: You need not have come so early in the morning.
zh: 你大清早的真没必要赶过来。

en: With all her merits she was not proud.
zh: 尽管她有很多优点，但她一点儿也不傲气。

en: Never have I seen such a big whale.
zh: 我从没见过这么大的鲸鱼。

en: You must be a good athlete to have run a mile in such a short time.
zh: 能在这么短时间内跑完一英里，你肯定是个很棒的运动员。

en: I can't apply my mind to anything with all that noise!
zh: 吵成这样，我根本没心思干活！

en: Can he be ill when he runs around like that?
zh: 他都跑成那样了，怎么可能是生病了？

en: I've never heard English spoken so quickly.
zh: 我从没听过语速这么快的英语。

en: It is fortunate that we should have met such kind people.
zh: 能遇到这么好心的人，咱们真是走运。

en: Liking children the way she does Sue should become a teacher.
zh: 苏那么喜欢小孩，真该去当个老师。

en: I had never seen such an exciting baseball game before.
zh: 我以前从来没看过这么精彩的棒球赛。

en: I wish I hadn't seen such a horrible film.
zh: 我真后悔看了这么一部烂片。

en: You are fortunate to have such loving parents.
zh: 你有这么疼你的爸妈，真幸福。

en: I wish I hadn't spent so much money.
zh: 我真后悔花了那么多钱。

en: If I tried to wear shoes with heels that high, I'd sprain my ankle.
zh: 我要是穿那么高的跟儿，准得崴脚。

en: I wish I had not spent so much money.
zh: 真后悔花了这么多钱。

en: Shame on you for getting so flustered. You looked ridiculous.
zh: 瞧你刚才慌得那样，真丢人，看着太傻了。

en: I'd love to be able to wear a dress like that. But I'll have to lose some weight first.
zh: 我也想穿那样的裙子，不过我得先减减肥。

en: She was the last person I had expected to see there.
zh: 我压根儿没想到会在这儿碰到她。

en: It's quite absurd of you to tell her that sort of thing.
zh: 你跟她说这种话，简直不可理喻。

en: It's the first time that anybody said something like that to me.
zh: 还是头一次有人跟我说这种话。

en: It is courageous of you to say such a thing.
zh: 你能说出这种话，还真挺有勇气的。

en: You've got to be crazy to do something like that.
zh: 做这种事，你肯定是疯了。

en: After what has happened, I dare not see her again.
zh: 出了这种事，我再也不敢见她了。

en: You shouldn't have said such a thing to her.
zh: 你真不该跟她说那种话。

en: How long are you going to be seeing that loser of a boyfriend?
zh: 你到底还要跟那个渣男处多久啊？

en: It's hard to complain against such good people.
zh: 这么好的人，真让人没法抱怨。

en: The number of errors of fact in Arendt's book are considerably fewer than Abel implies.
zh: 阿伦特书里的事实错误比阿贝尔暗示的要少得多。

en: It seems Ann and Zachary ran off together.
zh: 看来安和扎卡里私奔了。

en: Andersen was afraid of dogs, too.
zh: 安徒生以前也怕狗。

en: I was looking for Andy. Do you know where he is?
zh: 我在找安迪，你知道他在哪儿吗？

en: Andy is never late for a date.
zh: 安迪约会从来不迟到。

en: Andy must have practiced very hard.
zh: 安迪肯定练得很刻苦。

en: Andy hung his shirt up in the closet.
zh: 安迪把衬衫挂在衣柜里了。

en: Andy is master of French and German.
zh: 安迪精通法语和德语。

en: Oh, and Andy Dillon called...
zh: 哦对了，安迪·狄伦打电话来了……

en: You've got the wrong station.
zh: 你调错台了。

en: What know you of patience?
zh: 你懂什么是耐心吗？

en: You came when I was thirty.
zh: 你来的时候我才三十岁。

en: You can't be hungry. You had a snack a few minutes ago.
zh: 你肯定不饿，几分钟前你才吃过点心。

en: You have a good camera.
zh: 你的相机挺不错的。

en: If you dress like that at your age, you'll make a fool of yourself.
zh: 你这把年纪穿成那样，会让人笑话的。

en: I am afraid your watch is two minutes slow.
zh: 你的表好像慢了两分钟。

en: Everybody except the Anderson family is going to the party next Thursday evening.
zh: 除了安德森一家，大家下周四晚上都要去参加派对。

en: Why are you with a pig?

en: What are you lining up for?

en: Anthony was esteemed by the Egyptians.

en: The apricot trees are in full blossom.

en: Angola was once a Portuguese territory.

en: The questionnaires were distributed at random.
zh: 调查问卷是随机发放的。

en: The questionnaire form was distributed properly.
zh: 问卷已经妥善分发了。

en: I love Ann all the more because she is shy.
zh: 就因为安很害羞，我反而更喜欢她了。

en: Ann cannot be playing the piano.
zh: 安不可能在弹钢琴。

en: Is the rumor that Anne will get married to John true?
zh: 安要和约翰结婚的传闻是真的吗？

en: Either Ann or Carol is going to take care of the baby.
zh: 要么是安，要么是卡罗尔会来照顾孩子。

en: Huh? What is this? They're not going to use my proposal?
zh: 啊？什么情况？他们不用我的提案吗？

en: Being a hasty person, he is likely to jump to conclusions.
zh: 他这人急脾气，容易草率下结论。

en: Being written in great haste, this letter has quite a few mistakes.
zh: 这封信写得太急了，所以有不少错误。

en: Marry in haste, and repent at leisure.
zh: 仓促结婚，后悔一辈子。

en: You should grab your bag and hurry home.
zh: 你该拿上包赶紧回家。

en: It's better to take your time at this job than to hurry and make mistakes.
zh: 这活儿宁可慢慢做，也比急急忙忙出错强。

en: Hasty marriage seldom succeeds.
zh: 闪婚很少有成功的。

en: What's that?
zh: 那是什么？

en: I have heard nothing from him since then.
zh: 从那以后我就再也没听到过他的消息了。

en: Nothing can be worse than that.
zh: 没有比那更糟糕的了。

en: I have had a series of misfortunes since then.
zh: 从那以后我就一直走霉运。

en: Will you introduce me to the young woman talking with Mrs. Allen?
zh: 你能帮我介绍一下正在跟艾伦太太说话的那位年轻女士吗？

en: Allen was given a problem that was impossible to solve.
zh: 艾伦遇到了一个根本没法解决的问题。

en: Can I see that one?
zh: 我能看看那个吗？

en: Do you have any allergies?
zh: 你对什么过敏吗？

en: I have allergic rhinitis.
zh: 我有过敏性鼻炎。

en: Those are their books.
zh: 那些是他们的书。

en: Whose books are those?
zh: 那些是谁的书？

en: Those are our teachers' cars.
zh: 那些是我们老师的车。

en: Those are my sister's books.
zh: 那些是我姐姐的书。

en: Those are my books.
zh: 那些是我的书。

en: Those are my CDs.
zh: 那些是我的CD。

en: Those are our books.
zh: 那些是我们的书。

en: Are those your pictures?
zh: 那些是你的照片吗？

en: They move from place to place.
zh: 他们老是搬来搬去的。

en: Those books are theirs.
zh: 那些书是他们的。

en: Those cats are liked by her.
zh: 她挺喜欢那几只猫的。

en: What do you think of those Japanese writers?
zh: 你觉得那几个日本作家怎么样？

en: Those mechanics are paid as much as ten thousand yen per hour.
zh: 那些技工每小时能挣一万日元。

en: Those photos are hers.
zh: 那些照片是她的。

en: Those houses are 500 years old.
zh: 那些房子有五百年历史了。

en: Those flowers smell sweet.
zh: 那些花闻着挺香的。

en: Those houses are big.
zh: 那些房子很大。

en: Those houses are my uncle's.
zh: 那些房子是我叔叔的。

en: The reputation of those musicians is not the best.
zh: 那些音乐家的名声不太好。

en: Those dark clouds will probably bring rain.
zh: 那些乌云看着要下雨了。

en: Those apples are big.
zh: 那些苹果很大。

en: Those dogs are big.
zh: 那些狗很大。

en: His patience was worn out by all these troubles and anxieties.
zh: 这么多烦心事把他的耐心都磨没了。

en: That is not an orange, either.
zh: 那个也不是橘子。

en: The game would not have been called off if it hadn't rained so heavily.
zh: 要不是雨下得这么大，比赛就不会取消了。

en: For all the money he has, he is not happy.
zh: 尽管他很有钱，但他并不快乐。

en: For all his wealth, he is not happy.
zh: 他虽然很有钱，但并不开心。

en: For all his wealth and fame, he is unhappy.
zh: 尽管有名有利，他还是不开心。

en: For all his experience, he had no idea what to do with it.
zh: 尽管很有经验，他还是不知道该怎么办。

en: That's the man who lives next door.
zh: 那个人就住在隔壁。

en: It was so hard, I tell you.
zh: 跟你说，那真的太难了。

en: Is that a picture of me?
zh: 那是我的照片吗？

en: That is a student whom my father teaches.
zh: 那是我父亲教的一个学生。

en: That is her house.
zh: 那是她的房子。

en: That is the temple which they live in.
zh: 那是他们住的寺庙。

en: That is his house.
zh: 那是他的房子。

en: That is his car.
zh: 那是他的车。

en: Those were his actual words.
zh: 他原话就是这么说的。

en: That is the picture that he painted.
zh: 那是他画的画。

en: That is the house where he lives.
zh: 那是他住的房子。

en: That is not a horse, but a donkey.
zh: 那不是马，是头驴。

en: That is such a high mountain as old people can't climb.
zh: 那座山太高了，老人爬不上去。

en: Is that a cat or a dog?
zh: 那是猫还是狗？

en: That is a pagoda.
zh: 那是座佛塔。

en: That's a farce.
zh: 那就是场闹剧。

en: Whose book is that?
zh: 那是谁的书？

en: Whose car is that?
zh: 那是谁的车？

en: Whose shoes are those?
zh: 那是谁的鞋？

en: I call that some poem.
zh: 那也叫诗啊。

en: That is new a shop which opened last week.
zh: 那是家上周刚开的新店。

en: One thing led to another.
zh: 后来事赶事，就成那样了。

en: That is the highest mountain in the world.
zh: 那是世界上最高的山。

en: That is the fastest train in the world.
zh: 那是世界上最快的火车。

en: That is our school.
zh: 那是我们的学校。

en: That is my sister's camera.
zh: 那是我姐的相机。

en: That is the building where my father works.
zh: 那是我爸工作的那栋楼。

en: This is my dog.
zh: 这是我的狗。

en: That was my mistake.
zh: 那是我的错。

en: That is not my pen.
zh: 那不是我的笔。

en: That is my overcoat.
zh: 那是我的大衣。

en: That's our house.
zh: 那是我们家。

en: That is the restaurant where we had dinner yesterday.
zh: 那是我们昨天吃晚饭的餐厅。

en: That is the shop where I used to work.
zh: 那是我以前打工的那家店。

en: That is the house where I was born.
zh: 那是我出生的房子。

en: That is the same bicycle as I have.
zh: 那辆自行车跟我那辆一样。

en: That is the same skirt as I bought yesterday.
zh: 那条裙子跟我昨天买的一样。

en: That's the boy I saw yesterday.
zh: 那就是我昨天见到的那个男孩。

en: That was the most interesting novel that I had ever read.
zh: 那是我读过最有趣的小说了。

en: That is the man whom I know well.
zh: 那个人我很熟。

en: That is the girl whom I know well.

zh: 那就是昨天来的那个男孩。

en: I bet he is our principal.
zh: 我敢打赌，他就是我们的校长。

en: Yeah, she must be the sure thing!

zh: 没有比那更难的任务了。

zh: 你能告诉我这个和那个比起来怎么样吗？

en: To teach Alex, Pepperberg used a special form of training.
zh: 为了教亚历克斯，佩珀伯格使用了一种特殊的训练方法。

en: How many cars does Alex have?
zh: 亚历克斯有多少辆车？

en: Alex is for the most part just an ordinary bird.
zh: 亚历克斯大体上就是一只普通的鸟。

en: Alex will answer, "Color!"
zh: 亚历克斯会回答：“颜色！”

en: Alex seemed to learn nouns such as "paper," "key" and "cork," and color names such as "red," "green" and "yellow."
zh: 亚历克斯似乎学会了“纸”、“钥匙”和“软木塞”之类的名词，以及“红”、“绿”、“黄”之类的颜色名称。

en: "Five!" says Alex.
zh: “五个！”亚历克斯说。

en: Alex would correctly describe the object and color, even if he had never seen that object before.
zh: 即使是以前没见过的物体，亚历克斯也能正确描述出它的形状和颜色。

en: Alex names objects, like "walnut," "paper" and "corn".
zh: 亚历克斯能叫出物体的名字，比如“核桃”、“纸”和“玉米”。

en: That amount of food will last them for a week.
zh: 那点食物够他们吃一个星期了。

en: Ask Alex.

en: How long did it take you to collect so many coins?
zh: 你收集这么多硬币花了多久？

en: You shouldn't even try making sense of it.
zh: 你甚至都不该试着去理解它。

en: I have taken everything into consideration.
zh: 我已经把一切都考虑进去了。

en: The worried housewife heard the telephone ring and quickly picked up the receiver.
zh: 那个焦虑的家庭主妇听到电话响了，赶紧拿起了听筒。

en: Is that a bat?

en: That was his nearest approach to a smile.
zh: 那是他最接近笑的表情了。

en: That is mine.
zh: 那是我的。

en: That is my school.
zh: 那是我的学校。

en: That is our baseball field.
zh: 那是我们的棒球场。

en: That is the house where I have lived for a long time.
zh: 那就是我住了很久的那房子。

en: That must be the city hall.
zh: 那一定是市政厅。

en: That is the poet I met in Paris.
zh: 那就是我在巴黎遇到的那个诗人。

zh: 那是这个城市的主要街道。

en: Isn't that the Golden Gate Bridge?

en: Oh, I didn't know it was that close.
zh: 噢，我不知道竟然离得那么近。

en: According to one story, the money was round so that it could roll from place to place.
zh: 有个说法是，钱之所以是圆的，是为了让它能到处滚动。

en: A travel agent arranged everything for our trip.
zh: 旅行社帮我们把旅行的一切都安排好了。

en: One evening a man came to my house.
zh: 一天晚上，有个男人来到我家。

en: In a way, life is a cruel thing. It holds major problems in store for each one of us.
zh: 从某种程度上说，生活是残酷的。它给每个人都准备了巨大的难题。

en: Just because a certain book does not interest readers does not mean that the fault lies in the book.
zh: 仅仅因为某本书没能引起读者的兴趣，并不代表错在书本身。

en: I'm working for a trading firm.
zh: 我在一家贸易公司上班。

en: I don't think it's easy to form your own opinion on an issue.
zh: 我觉得要对一个问题形成自己的见解并不容易。

en: I'd like to put some things in the hotel safe.
zh: 我想把一些东西存在酒店的保险箱里。

en: I perceived an object looming through the mist.
zh: 我察觉到一个物体在迷雾中若隐若现。

en: You could always hand off some of the work to the junior staff.
zh: 你总可以把一些工作交给底下的新人去做。

en: A critic once said that if you saw my ballet paintings, you didn't have to go to a live performance.
zh: 曾有评论家说，要是看了我的芭蕾舞画，就没必要去看现场表演了。

en: One night he came home very tired and sad.
zh: 有天晚上他回家时，又累又难过。

en: One night a merchant was walking up the slope on his way home.
zh: 有天晚上，一个商人走在回家的山坡路上。

en: One Sunday morning George burst into the living room and said the following.
zh: 一个周日的早晨，乔治冲进客厅说了下面这些话。

en: One day she met a wolf in the woods.
zh: 有一天她在森林里遇到了一只狼。

en: One day she was spoken to by a stranger.
zh: 有一天有个陌生人和她搭话了。

en: One day she and I visited an old friend.
zh: 有一天我和她去拜访了一位老朋友。

en: One day he set off on a long walk around the town.
zh: 有一天他出发在镇上走了好长一段路。

en: One day he went to see the doctor.
zh: 有一天他去看医生了。

en: One day he was walking along the street.
zh: 有一天他正走在街上。

en: It was certain that he saw her there on a certain day.
zh: 可以肯定的是，他在某天确实在那儿见过她。

en: One day I visited an old friend.
zh: 有一天我去拜访了一位老朋友。

en: One day I was lost in London.
zh: 有一天我在伦敦迷路了。

en: One day I visited my aunt.
zh: 有一天我去看我姨妈了。

en: One day Mike and Jane went downtown to do some shopping.
zh: 有一天麦克和简去市中心买东西了。

en: One day Byron awoke to find himself famous.
zh: 有一天拜伦醒来，发现自己成名了。

en: One day, the police raided a whole group of prostitutes, and the girl was among them.
zh: 有一天，警察扫黄抓了一帮妓女，那个女孩也在其中。

en: One day a girl came to visit me.
zh: 有一天有个女孩来找我。

en: One day an old man went fishing in the river.
zh: 有一天一个老头去河里钓鱼。

en: One day, she told me that she wanted a pet cat.
zh: 有一天，她跟我说她想要只宠物猫。

en: One day he helped a weak turtle.
zh: 有一天他救了一只虚弱的乌龟。

en: One day he killed himself.

en: One day I met him.

en: I visited my uncle in the country one day.

en: One winter morning I met him.

en: According to one legend, it gets its name from a priest.

en: I can trust him to a certain extent.

en: You are right to a certain extent.

en: I agree with what you say to some extent.

en: To some extent I agree with you.

en: I agree with you to a certain extent.
zh: 我在一定程度上同意你。

en: I trust him to some extent.
zh: 我某种程度上还是信任他的。

en: In a sense, I can understand his confusion.

en: You must assimilate into new surroundings.

en: I agree with you to some extent.
zh: 我在一定程度上同意你。

en: When a currency depreciates, that has an inflationary effect on the economy of the country of the currency.

en: According to a survey, three in five people today are indifferent to foreign affairs.

en: I awoke one morning and found myself famous.

en: I awoke one morning to find myself famous.
zh: 有天早上醒来，我发现自己出名了。

zh: 有天吃早饭时，让我们非常郁闷的是，我们被告知不能再像以前那样疯玩了。

zh: 有个男的在那大声抱怨着什么。

en: If you watch the sun setting on a warm, damp day, you can see the moisture changing the shape of the sun.
zh: 要是在又暖和又潮湿的日子看日落，你能看到水汽把太阳的形状都变样了。

en: If you want to know how a certain word is used, look it up in this dictionary.

zh: 有个女孩是做小姐的，但她不想让她奶奶知道。

zh: 前几天有个女的在逛商场的时候把驾照给丢了。

zh: 事故里有个女的受伤了，她两个女儿也受伤了。

zh: 有个女的拿着她去世丈夫戴着帽子的旧照片去找摄影师。

en: One hot summer afternoon she decided to take her boyfriend to a farm outside the town.
zh: 夏天一个闷热的下午，她决定带男朋友去城外的一个农场。

zh: 夏天一个闷热的下午，约翰和丹正在割长草。

en: They were erected to commemorate a certain event or to tell an ancestral legend.
zh: 竖起这些是为了纪念某个事儿，或者讲述祖先的传说。

en: If a tree dies, plant another in its place.
zh: 如果树死了，就在原来的地方再种一棵。

en: Certain poisons, properly used, are useful.
zh: 有些毒药如果用得对，也是有用的。

en: Some animals can sense the coming of a storm.

en: Certain animals are fast disappearing.
zh: 有些动物正在迅速灭绝。

en: Some kinds of birds can't fly.
zh: 有些种类的鸟不会飞。

en: We can conjecture that it may be advantageous for a particular bird to be known to its neighbors or its mate.
zh: 我们可以推测，对于某只特定的鸟来说，让邻居或伴侣认出来是有好处的。

en: Some kinds of food make one thirsty.
zh: 有些食物吃了容易让人口渴。

en: The prices of certain foods vary from week to week.
zh: 有些食品的价格每周都在变。

en: Some plants cannot adapt themselves to the cold.
zh: 有些植物没法适应寒冷的环境。

en: That kind of behavior is characteristic of the boy.
zh: 那种行为就是那男孩的典型表现。

en: In one letter he remarks, "Life is but a dream".
zh: 他在信里感叹道：“人生如梦。”

en: What is right in one society can be wrong in another.
zh: 在一个社会是对的事情，在另一个社会可能就是错的。

en: I got hurt during an experiment, and the injury was pretty serious.
zh: 我做实验的时候受伤了，伤得还挺重。

en: There have always been fashionable faces and expressions which marked an epoch.
zh: 每个时代总会有一些标志性的面孔和表情引领潮流。

en: The museums are full of objects which the most cultivated taste of a period considered beautiful, but which seem to us now worthless.
zh: 博物馆里到处都是些当时审美觉得漂亮，但在我们现在看来一文不值的东西。

en: The best way to know what a country is like is to go and see it with your own eyes.
zh: 了解一个国家最好的办法就是亲眼去看一看。

en: If you are to know a nation, you must learn its history.
zh: 要想了解一个民族，你得先了解它的历史。

en: When I first visit a country, I always try to share a meal with the people there.
zh: 我第一次去一个国家的时候，总喜欢跟当地人一起吃顿饭。

en: The manners and customs of a country reflect its culture.
zh: 一个国家的风俗习惯能反映出它的文化。

en: As soon as one airline announced its plan for airfare reductions, the rest of the companies followed suit.
zh: 一家航空公司刚宣布降价，其他公司就立马跟着做了。

en: An idea came to me.
zh: 我想到了一个主意。

en: A certain door-to-door salesman made a fool of a trusting old lady and went off with a lot of her money.
zh: 有个上门推销的把一个轻信别人的老太太耍得团团转，还卷走了她不少钱。

en: There lived a king in an old castle.
zh: 古堡里住着一位国王。

en: A study reports that 53,000 Americans die each year as a result of secondhand smoke.
zh: 一项研究报告说，美国每年有5.3万人死于二手烟。

en: According to a study, big women are more prone to have twins.

en: A study shows lung cancer accounts for 17% of women's cancer deaths.

en: One professor says that even if Alex is using words, it's wrong to call it a language.
zh: 有位教授说，即使艾利克斯在用词，把它称作一种语言也是不对的。

en: A strange idea sprang up in my mind.
zh: 我脑子里冒出了一个奇特的念头。

en: I'm going to see some student.

en: A scholar made an excellent speech about human rights.
zh: 一位学者做了一场关于人权的精彩演讲。

en: A foreigner asked me where the station was.
zh: 有个老外问我车站在哪儿。

en: One Tuesday I stayed home because I had an appointment with the dentist later in the morning.
zh: 有一个周二我待在家里，因为上午晚些时候我约了牙医。

en: A song says a girl's mind is variable.
zh: 歌里唱道，女孩子的心思变幻莫测。

en: The movie director was enchanted by Kate at first sight.
zh: 导演对凯特一见钟情。

en: One rainy morning I woke up to find myself famous.
zh: 一个下雨的早晨，我一觉醒来发现自己出名了。

en: One rainy evening he was driving a car.
zh: 一个下雨的傍晚，他正在开车。

en: In a sense what he says is true.
zh: 从某种意义上说，他说的没错。

en: On a rainy morning he left his house early so as to be in time for school.
zh: 在一个下雨的早晨，他早早就出门了，为了准时赶到学校。

en: In a way you are right, but I still have doubts.
zh: 某种程度上讲你是对的，但我还是有疑虑。

en: In a sense, it is true.
zh: 从某种意义上说，这是真的。

en: Polite language, in a sense, spoils a casual atmosphere.
zh: 礼貌用语在某种意义上会破坏随性的氛围。

en: In a sense, life is only a dream.
zh: 从某种意义上说，人生如梦。

en: In a way, what your friend has said is true.
zh: 某种程度上，你朋友说的是实话。

en: In a sense, you are wrong.
zh: 从某种意义上说，你错了。

en: In a sense, such a political movement may be called a revolution.
zh: 从某种意义上说，这种政治运动可以被称为一场革命。

en: In a sense, you are right.
zh: 从某种意义上说，你是对的。

en: In a way, you're wrong.
zh: 某种程度上讲，你错了。

en: In a sense, life is but a dream.
zh: 从某种意义上讲，人生不过是一场梦。

en: In a way, Susie seems like my mother.
zh: 某种程度上，苏西看起来很像我妈妈。

en: It was said that a great poet had resided here.
zh: 据说曾有一位伟大的诗人住在这里。

en: If you turn a blind eye to something, you ignore it.
zh: 如果你对某事视而不见，你就是在忽略它。

en: I like Alpine skiing better than Nordic skiing.
zh: 比起北欧式滑雪，我更喜欢高山滑雪。

en: You have to be outside something, able to experience it from a distance, before it makes sense.
zh: 你得跳出圈子，从远处观察，才能明白其中的意义。

en: Alfred was made captain of the team.
zh: 阿尔弗雷德被选为了队长。

en: The Alps are in the center of Europe.
zh: 阿尔卑斯山位于欧洲中部。

en: The scenery of the Alps left a lasting impression on me.
zh: 阿尔卑斯山的景色给我留下了深刻的印象。

en: Say the alphabet backwards.
zh: 倒着念字母表。

en: Write the alphabet in capitals.
zh: 用大写字母写字母表。

en: How many letters are there in the alphabet?
zh: 字母表里有多少个字母？

en: The alphabet consists of 26 letters.
zh: 字母表由26个字母组成。

en: 'A' comes before 'B' in the alphabet.
zh: 在字母表中，A排在B前面。

en: In the alphabet, B comes after A.
zh: 在字母表中，B排在A后面。

en: Will you show me your photo album?
zh: 能给我看看你的相册吗？

en: An alpaca looks like a horse and a camel.
zh: 羊驼长得既像马又像骆驼。

en: Today is my second day of my side job.
zh: 今天是我做兼职的第二天。

en: I'll have to find a part-time job.
zh: 我得找份兼职工作。

en: Working part-time, I found that some customers were polite, whereas others were not.
zh: 做兼职的时候我发现，有些顾客很有礼貌，有些则不然。

en: I have no job, so I can never save money.
zh: 我没工作，所以根本存不下钱。

en: I think a part-time job is a good experience.
zh: 我觉得做兼职是一段很好的经历。

en: I made a lot of money on the side.
zh: 我搞副业赚了不少钱。

en: Albert is quick at learning.
zh: 阿尔伯特学东西特别快。

en: Albert is the last person to break a promise.
zh: 阿尔伯特是最不可能食言的人了。

en: Albert is engaged in foreign trade and often goes abroad.
zh: 阿尔伯特是做外贸的，经常出国。

en: Albert, I hope you'll stand by me if I get in trouble.
zh: 阿尔伯特，要是我遇到麻烦，希望你能挺我。

en: The amount of time someone is willing to spend on something may communicate how important it is to him.
zh: 一个人愿意在一件事上花多少时间，就能看出这件事对他有多重要。

en: Don't drink any alcohol.
zh: 别喝酒。

en: Do you have any non-alcoholic drinks?
zh: 你这儿有不含酒精的饮料吗？

en: An alcoholic tends not to die happily.
zh: 酗酒的人往往不得善终。

en: Do you have anything non-alcoholic?
zh: 有不含酒精的东西吗？

en: Alcohol consumption is increasing every year.
zh: 酒精消费量每年都在增长。

en: He was under the influence of alcohol when he crashed his car.
zh: 他撞车的时候喝了酒。

en: Alcohol has done great mischief to his body.
zh: 酒精把他的身体搞垮了。

en: Alcohol is beginning to tell on his speech.
zh: 他喝得说话都不利索了。

en: Does ALC's web site include an archive of English expressions?
zh: ALC的网站上有英语表达的存档吗？

en: Life as it is is very uninteresting to him.
zh: 对他来说，现实生活特别没意思。

en: Perhaps that's true.
zh: 也许那是真的吧。

en: Try to see things as they are.
zh: 试着看清事实吧。

en: There is a curious story about an Englishman.
zh: 有个关于英国人的奇怪故事。

en: One American scientist, William Keeton, used a very interesting experiment to solve this mystery.
zh: 一位叫威廉·基顿的美国科学家用了一个很有意思的实验解开了这个谜团。

en: One sunny day in April, I went out for a walk.
zh: 四月的一个晴天，我出去散了散步。

en: A 19-year-old Canadian broke the world record last month for a nonstop, round-trip swim across the English Channel.
zh: 上个月，一名19岁的加拿大人打破了不间断往返游过英吉利海峡的世界纪录。

en: All the money is lost.
zh: 钱全丢了。

en: There is one, but it's a little far.
zh: 有一个，就是离得有点远。

en: This is just another day.
zh: 这就是很平常的一天。

en: We often hear it said that ants are social animals.
zh: 我们常听说蚂蚁是群居动物。

en: Ants work away during summer.
zh: 蚂蚁在夏天一直不停地干活。

en: The alibi points to her innocence.
zh: 不在场证明说明她是清白的。

en: Don't think little of the ants' lives.
zh: 别小看蚂蚁的生命。

en: Sysko works like an ant.
zh: Sysko干起活来跟蚂蚁一样勤快。

en: It is difficult to tell the bare facts.
zh: 真相很难说清楚。

en: Ants have a well-organized society.
zh: 蚂蚁的社会非常有秩序。

en: I spent all the savings I had on this.
zh: 我把所有的积蓄都花在这上面了。

en: I gave her all the money I had.
zh: 我把身上所有的钱都给她了。

en: Alice has a flower on her head.
zh: 爱丽丝头上戴着一朵花。

en: Alice slid down the long slide.
zh: 爱丽丝从长长的滑梯上滑了下来。

en: Alice hung her head in shame.
zh: 爱丽丝羞愧地低下了头。

en: Alice rushed into her room.
zh: 爱丽丝冲进了她的房间。

en: Alice wasn't listening to her sister.
zh: 爱丽丝没在听她姐姐说话。

en: Alice was frightened of her strict mother.
zh: 爱丽丝很怕她那个严厉的妈妈。

en: Alice wears a sweet perfume.
zh: 爱丽丝喷了一种甜甜的香水。

en: Alice wasn't present at the meeting, was she?
zh: 爱丽丝没去开会吧？

en: Alice smiled.
zh: 爱丽丝笑了笑。

en: Alice may possibly come.
zh: 爱丽丝可能会来。

en: Alice returned home early from work with a severe headache.
zh: 爱丽丝因为头疼得厉害，提前下班回家了。

en: Alice didn't see the dog.
zh: 爱丽丝没看到那条狗。

en: It seems that Alice is very pleased with the suit.
zh: 看来爱丽丝对这套衣服挺满意的。

en: Alice has had a cold since last Sunday.
zh: 爱丽丝从上周日就开始感冒了。

en: Alice went to bed at ten.
zh: 爱丽丝十点就睡了。

en: Alice, not knowing where to find the book, asked her mother where it was.
zh: 爱丽丝不知道去哪找那本书，就问她妈妈书在哪。

en: Alice might have been there yesterday, but we didn't see her.
zh: 爱丽丝昨天可能在那儿，但我们没见到她。

en: The green color becomes Alice.
zh: 绿色很衬爱丽丝。

en: It was to the concert that Alice went yesterday.
zh: 爱丽丝昨天去的是音乐会。

en: I think it strange that Alice should keep silence for such a long time.
zh: 我觉得爱丽丝这么久不说话挺奇怪的。

en: John broke in as Alice was speaking.
zh: 爱丽丝正说话呢，约翰插了嘴。

en: It was yesterday that Alice went to a concert.
zh: 爱丽丝是昨天去听音乐会的。

en: Ants are swarming around the sugar.
zh: 糖周围聚了一堆蚂蚁。

en: We shot our wad.
zh: 我们倾其所有了。

en: Thank you, brothers.
zh: 谢谢了，兄弟们。

en: Thanks, but no thanks.
zh: 谢了，但还是算了吧。

en: You might at least say "thank you."
zh: 你至少该说声“谢谢”。

en: Thank you. I used to play tennis in high school.
zh: 谢谢。我高中那会儿打过网球。

en: Thanks. Maybe we'll come back.
zh: 谢谢，也许我们以后还会回来。

en: Thanks. When you get off work, we'll go to my place for another.
zh: 谢了。等你下班了，咱们去我那儿再喝一杯。

en: Thanks, Yukina.
zh: 谢谢你，雪菜。

en: Thank you, I've had enough.
zh: 谢谢，不用了，我够了。

en: I'm fine, too, thank you.
zh: 我也挺好的，谢谢。

en: I appreciate it, but I think I shouldn't.
zh: 谢谢你的好意，但我觉得我不该这样做。

en: I have more than enough time.
zh: 我时间多得是。

en: Nobody likes to be found fault with.
zh: 没人喜欢被挑刺儿。

en: Ah, we have run short of sugar.
zh: 哎呀，我们的糖用完了。

en: Alan Tate and I looked at one another for a while.
zh: 艾伦·泰特和我对视了好一会儿。

en: Everything is subject to the laws of nature.
zh: 万物都遵循自然规律。

en: What is a cynic? A man who knows the price of everything, and the value of nothing.
zh: 什么是愤世嫉俗的人？就是那种知道所有东西的价格，却不知道其价值的人。

en: Every insult was put on him.
zh: 所有的侮辱都落在了他身上。

en: All inventions grow out of necessity.
zh: 所有发明都源于需要。

en: Research revealed that the same high truancy levels were to be found in every inner city district.
zh: 研究显示，每个内城区都有同样高的逃学率。

en: We are surprised to see how every creature lives.
zh: 看到各种生物的生存方式，我们感到很惊讶。

en: All the truth is not to be told at all time.
zh: 真话没必要随时都说出来。

en: People in every walk of life go to church.
zh: 各行各业的人都去教堂。

en: Jack of all trades is master of none.
zh: 样样通，样样松。

en: I've looked everywhere, but I can't find my wallet.
zh: 我到处都找遍了，但就是找不到钱包。

en: People everywhere yearn for public leaders dedicated to world peace.
zh: 各地的人们都渴望能有致力于世界和平的领袖。

en: All sorts of people came to the exhibition.
zh: 各种各样的人都来参观了展览。

en: Every situation requires individual analysis.
zh: 任何情况都需要具体问题具体分析。

en: Taking all things into consideration, his conduct can be excused.
zh: 综合考虑，他的行为是可以原谅的。

en: Everything concurred to make him happy.
zh: 所有的事凑到一块儿，都让他感到很快乐。

en: All things considered, he is a good teacher.
zh: 总的来说，他是个好老师。

en: Taking everything into consideration, the result is better than I expected.
zh: 考虑到所有因素，结果比我想象的要好。

en: Every child objects to being treated like a baby.
zh: 每个孩子都不喜欢被当成小宝宝看待。

en: It is essential that every child have the same educational opportunities.
zh: 必须确保每个孩子都有平等的教育机会。

en: The history of every country begins in the heart of a man or a woman.
zh: 每个国家的历史都始于一个人的内心。

en: Every cause produces more than one effect.
zh: 每个因都会产生不止一个果。

en: Regard all art critics as useless and dangerous.
zh: 把所有的艺术评论家都看作是无用且危险的。

en: You must avail yourself of every opportunity.
zh: 你必须抓住每一个机会。

en: You should avail yourself of every opportunity.
zh: 你应该把握住每一个机会。

en: Every opportunity is used, and you should do English practice.
zh: 要利用每一个机会，你也该练习英语。

en: Try to make the most of every opportunity.
zh: 尽量充分利用每一个机会。

en: We tried all means possible.
zh: 我们想尽了一切办法。

en: All possible means have been tried.
zh: 所有能想的办法都试过了。

en: There is a limit to everything.
zh: 凡事都有个度。

en: I have looked everywhere, but I can not find my wallet.
zh: 我到处都找了，但就是找不到我的钱包。

en: All things taken into consideration, my father's life was a happy one.
zh: 总的来说，我父亲的一生过得很幸福。

en: All things considered, he led a happy life.
zh: 综合来看，他过着幸福的生活。

en: I think everything is going well.
zh: 我觉得一切进展得都挺顺利。

en: The most important feature of all games is that they are governed by rules.
zh: 所有游戏最重要的特征就是必须遵守规则。

en: Yecch. This rice cracker is soggy.
zh: 呃，这米饼都皮了。

en: I can't read Arabic script.
zh: 我看不懂阿拉伯语。

en: The Arabic script was replaced by the Roman alphabet.
zh: 阿拉伯字母被罗马字母取代了。

en: Arabic is a very important language.
zh: 阿拉伯语是一门非常重要的语言。

en: Arabic is written from right to left.
zh: 阿拉伯语是从右往左写的。

en: Arabia abounds in oil.
zh: 阿拉伯地区石油资源非常丰富。

en: They keep lambs for meat in Arabia.
zh: 在阿拉伯，他们养羊是为了吃肉。

en: A new difficulty presented itself.
zh: 出现了一个新困难。

en: In Alaska you can see natural phenomena like the aurora, right?
zh: 在阿拉斯加，你能看到极光之类的自然现象，对吧？

en: The storm blew for two days.
zh: 这场风暴刮了两天。

en: The storm abated.
zh: 风暴平息了。

en: The oak tree remained standing after the storm.
zh: 风暴过后，那棵橡树依然挺立着。

en: The storm laid the village flat.
zh: 风暴把村子夷为了平地。

en: Oh, I'm sorry. I guess I have the wrong number.
zh: 噢，不好意思，我想我打错电话了。

en: You should have telephoned in advance.
zh: 你本该提前打电话的。

en: We ought to have phoned ahead and reserved a table.
zh: 我们应该提前打电话订位的。

en: Let's get things ready beforehand.
zh: 咱们提前准备一下吧。

en: Please let me know the schedule beforehand.
zh: 请事先把日程安排告诉我。

en: Oh, no! I forgot to punch in again!
zh: 糟了！我又忘了打卡了！

en: Oh dear! I'm short of money.
zh: 天哪！我钱不够了。

en: Oh, just the usual stuff.
zh: 噢，就还是老样子。

en: Oh, I can hear you clearly.
zh: 噢，我能听清你说话。

en: Wow, you're dressed to kill.
zh: 哇，你穿得太惊艳了。

en: Oh, please call me Angela.
zh: 噢，叫我安吉拉就行。

en: Oh your daughter Haru-chan is very cheerful.
zh: 噢，你女儿小春酱性格真开朗。

en: She fumbled with a piece of paper.
zh: 她在那儿笨手笨脚地摆弄一张纸。

en: Aya tends to carry things to extremes.
zh: 亚弥这人容易走极端。

en: Aya likes intense colors, such as hot pink, electric blue and deep purple.
zh: 亚弥喜欢那种鲜艳的颜色，比如亮粉色、电光蓝和深紫色。

en: I nearly made a mistake.
zh: 我差点就犯错了。

en: Aya has good reason to speak perfect German.
zh: 亚弥德语说得这么好，是有原因的。

en: In American culture, speech is golden.
zh: 在美国文化里，能言善辩才是金。

en: The President of the U.S. paid a formal visit to China.
zh: 美国总统正式访问了中国。

en: The American Ambassador was invited to the gathering.
zh: 美国大使被邀请参加聚会。

en: A lot of people were out of work during the Great Depression in America.
zh: 美国大萧条期间，很多人都失业了。

en: He was the last person I had expected to see during my stay in America.
zh: 在美国期间，我最没想到的就是会见到他。

en: The ancestors of Native Americans went to the continent from Asia by way of the Bering Strait.
zh: 美洲原住民的祖先是从亚洲经由白令海峡迁徙过去的。

en: Born in America, Taro speaks good English.
zh: 太郎在美国出生，所以英语说得很好。

en: The American Government declared a state of emergency.
zh: 美国政府宣布进入紧急状态。

en: Two traits of Americans are generosity and energy.
zh: 慷慨和活力是美国人的两个特质。

en: Americans pay both federal taxes and state taxes.
zh: 美国人既要交联邦税，也要交州税。

en: The Americans are a democratic people.
zh: 美国人是很讲民主的。

en: Americans have the right to bear arms.
zh: 美国人拥有持枪的权利。

en: Americans eat a lot of meat.
zh: 美国人吃很多肉。

en: Americans may regard shy people as less capable than those who are not shy.
zh: 美国人可能觉得害羞的人不如外向的人有能力。

en: Americans are very friendly people.
zh: 美国人都挺友好的。

en: Many Americans like fast cars.
zh: 很多美国人都喜欢快车。

en: The Americans are an aggressive people.
zh: 美国人挺强势的。

en: Americans spend most of their lives working, being productive.
zh: 美国人一辈子大部分时间都在工作，追求产出。

en: Americans spend much of their free time at home.
zh: 美国人休息时大部分时间都待在家里。

en: Americans are frank enough to say what they think.
zh: 美国人很直爽，有什么就说什么。

en: Americans on the whole are a talkative people.
zh: 总的来说，美国人话挺多的。

en: What are Americans overlooking?
zh: 美国人忽略了什么？

en: Americans, in general, don't like to dress up.
zh: 美国人普遍不太喜欢穿正装。

en: Americans admire Lincoln for his honesty.
zh: 美国人因为林肯的诚实而很佩服他。

en: Americans called frankfurters "dachshund sausages."
zh: 美国人以前管法兰克福香肠叫“腊肠狗香肠”。

en: Americans participate in most sports.
zh: 各种运动美国人基本上都参加。

en: I hear that Americans spell it l-a-b-o-r.
zh: 我听说美国人把 labor 拼成 l-a-b-o-r。

en: The Americans had nothing to do with the matter.
zh: 美国人跟这事儿没关系。

en: With an American father and a French mother, she is bilingual.
zh: 她爸爸是美国人，妈妈是法国人，所以她会说双语。

en: Some Americans have grave debts.
zh: 有些美国人欠了一屁股债。

en: As is often the case with Americans, he does not care for raw fish.
zh: 就像典型的美国人一样，他不怎么爱吃生鱼片。

en: To Americans, a Japanese baby seems to have no privacy.
zh: 在美国人看来，日本小孩儿好像一点隐私都没有。

en: How would you know an American from an Englishman?
zh: 你怎么分辨美国人和英国人？

en: He doesn't seem to be an American.
zh: 他看着不像美国人。

en: I, as an American, admire Lincoln.
zh: 我作为一个美国人，很敬佩林肯。

en: Just as the Americans like baseball, the British like cricket.
zh: 就像美国人喜欢棒球一样，英国人喜欢板球。

en: Americans accumulated their trade deficits by living far beyond their means.
zh: 美国人过度消费，入不敷出，结果搞了一堆贸易赤字。

en: If the Americans had had less influence on affairs, war might well have been avoided.
zh: 要是美国人少插手这些事，战争可能就避免了。

en: The Americans don't accept Fascism any more than they do Communism.
zh: 美国人既不接受法西斯主义，也不接受共产主义。

en: A girl from America is in our class.
zh: 我们班有个美国女孩。

en: The first immigrants in American history came from England and the Netherlands.
zh: 美国历史上第一批移民来自英国和荷兰。

en: We met in the American history class.
zh: 我们是在美国历史课上认识的。

en: The USA is a good market for Japanese products.
zh: 美国是日本产品的一个好市场。

en: The United States is a large country.
zh: 美国是个大国。

en: The United States is a republic.
zh: 美国是个共和国。

en: The United States seems to have got caught up in the troubles between the three nations in Asia.
zh: 美国好像卷进亚洲那三个国家之间的麻烦里了。

en: The USA is composed of 50 states.
zh: 美国由50个州组成。

en: My fellow Americans: ask not what your country can do for you; ask what you can do for your country.
zh: 美国同胞们：不要问国家能为你做什么，要问你能为国家做什么。

en: The economic strength of the USA is not what it was.
zh: 美国的经济实力不如从前了。

en: There are fifty states in the United States.
zh: 美国有五十个州。

en: He went to Europe by way of America.
zh: 他经由美国去欧洲。

en: The U.S. economy is the largest in the world.
zh: 美国经济是全球规模最大的。

en: The U.S. economy is in good health.
zh: 美国经济现在挺健康的。

en: The American economy is in solid shape.
zh: 美国经济状况挺稳的。

en: The U.S. economy shrugged off the '87 Crash.
zh: 美国经济从87年的崩盘里挺过来了。

en: CEO's of American corporations are paid several times their Japanese counterparts.
zh: 美国公司的CEO工资是日本CEO的好几倍。

en: You shall not use this form while speaking American English.
zh: 说美式英语的时候别用这种形式。

en: I prefer French films to American ones.
zh: 比起美国电影，我更喜欢法国电影。

en: American films are more popular than those of any other country.
zh: 美国电影比其他任何国家的都受欢迎。

en: I'm crazy about American football.
zh: 我特别迷美式橄榄球。

en: In American football the defense has a specific job.
zh: 在美式橄榄球里，防守方有专门的任务。

en: Do you accept AMEX?
zh: 你们收运通卡吗？

en: You can fly across America in about five hours.
zh: 飞越美国全境大概要五个小时。

en: I have no time to go to America.
zh: 我没时间去美国。

en: Are we losing a day on the way to America?
zh: 我们去美国这一路上是不是会少一天？

en: If you are going to America, brush up your English.
zh: 要去美国的话，就把英语练练。

en: If you are to go to America, you had better learn English conversation.
zh: 如果你要去美国，最好学学英语口语。

en: You might as well stay at home as go to America.
zh: 与其去美国，你还不如待在家里。

en: Do you have any special reason why you want to go to America?
zh: 你想去美国有什么特别的原因吗？

en: A trip to America this summer is out of the question.
zh: 今年夏天去美国这事儿就别想了。

en: A trip to America is out of the question.
zh: 去美国这事儿没戏。

en: A trip to America was equivalent to a two-year salary for her.
zh: 去趟美国相当于她两年的工资。

en: The voyage to America used to take many weeks.
zh: 以前坐船去美国得花好几个星期。

en: America is a country on the move.
zh: 美国是个不断发展的国家。

en: America did away with slavery.
zh: 美国废除了奴隶制。

en: America is second to none in natural resources.
zh: 美国的自然资源是首屈一指的。

en: America abounds in oil.
zh: 美国盛产石油。

en: The U.S. is calling for an arms embargo against violators of the treaty.
zh: 美国正呼吁对违反条约的人实施武器禁运。

en: Americans eat lots of wheat, rye and other grains.
zh: 美国人吃很多小麦、黑麦和其他谷物。

en: America is proud of being a free country.
zh: 美国以自己是一个自由国家而自豪。

en: America will solve her problems for herself.
zh: 美国会自己解决自己的问题。

en: America likes to claim that it is a "classless" society.
zh: 美国喜欢宣称自己是一个“无阶级”社会。

en: The USA will only use air strikes in the country as a last resort.
zh: 美国只有在万不得已的情况下才会对该国进行空袭。

en: America is a large country and its people are mobile.
zh: 美国很大，而且人口流动性很高。

en: America is ahead in space technology.
zh: 美国在航天技术方面处于领先地位。

en: America is a land of immigrants.
zh: 美国是个移民国家。

en: America is a country of immigrants.
zh: 美国是一个由移民组成的国家。

en: The U.S. is deep in the red.
zh: 美国现在赤字非常严重。

en: America is very large.
zh: 美国非常大。

en: America is often referred to as a melting pot.
zh: 美国经常被称为“民族熔炉”。

en: The U.S. is a service economy.
zh: 美国是个服务型经济体。

en: The United States borders Canada.
zh: 美国和加拿大接壤。

en: When did America become independent of England?
zh: 美国是什么时候脱离英国独立的？

en: What's your impression of the United States?
zh: 你对美国的印象怎么样？

en: America did away with slavery in 1863.
zh: 美国在1863年废除了奴隶制。

en: He said that America declared its independence in 1776.
zh: 他说美国是在1776年宣布独立的。

en: America was discovered by Columbus in 1492.
zh: 哥伦布在1492年发现了美洲。

en: The U.S. thinks it is getting the short end of the stick.
zh: 美国觉得自己吃亏了。

en: Let's look back on the history of the United States.
zh: 咱们来回顾一下美国的历史。

en: In the early days of American history, blacks lived in slavery.
zh: 在美国历史早期，黑人过着被奴役的生活。

en: American parents are willing to say good things about their children in public.
zh: 美国父母很愿意在公共场合夸奖自己的孩子。

en: In the justice system of the United States, there are twelve people on a jury.
zh: 在美国的司法系统中，陪审团有十二个人。

en: While American methods are often successful, the Japanese educational system that produces the most literate people in the world surely has some lessons to teach the U.S.
zh: 虽说美国的方法经常奏效，但日本教育系统培养出了世界上读写水平最高的人，肯定有值得美国学习的地方。

en: The average American living space is twice as large as the living space in Japan.
zh: 美国人的平均居住面积是日本人的两倍。

en: The American culture had been transplanted from Europe.
zh: 美国文化是从欧洲移植过来的。

en: Many criminals in America are addicted to drugs.
zh: 美国很多罪犯都有毒瘾。

en: The urban population of America is increasing.
zh: 美国的城市人口正在增加。

en: The typical middle-class American baby comes home from the hospital to sleep in his own bed in his own room.
zh: 典型的美国中产阶级宝宝从医院回家后，就睡在自己房间的婴儿床上。

en: When applying to American universities, your TOEFL score is only one factor.
zh: 申请美国大学时，托福成绩只是其中一个因素。

en: American kitchens are much bigger than Japanese ones.
zh: 美国的厨房比日本的大得多。

en: There is no end in sight to the U.S. trade deficit with Japan.
zh: 美国对日本的贸易逆差一眼看不到头。

en: America's foreign debt shot past $500 billion.
zh: 美国的债务猛增到了5000亿美元以上。

en: The natives of the North-West Pacific Coast of America were probably descendants of tribes from Asia.
zh: 美国西北太平洋沿岸的土著人可能是来自亚洲部落的后裔。

en: The death penalty had been done away with in many states in the USA.
zh: 美国很多州都已经废除了死刑。

en: I was getting used to living in America.
zh: 我当时正慢慢习惯在美国生活。

en: American politics are interesting to watch, especially during a presidential election.
zh: 美国政治挺有意思的，特别是总统大选期间。

en: Is American food popular here in Japan?
zh: 美国菜在日本这儿受欢迎吗？

en: Slaves are brought to the American colonies.
zh: 奴隶们被带到了美洲殖民地。

en: Compared with those in America, Japanese marriages rarely end in divorce.
zh: 和美国相比，日本人的婚姻很少离婚。

en: American women didn't have the right to vote.
zh: 美国女性曾经没有投票权。

en: U.S. revisionists take a hard-line approach to Japanese relations.
zh: 美国修正主义者在对日关系上采取强硬立场。

en: What is the capital of the United States?
zh: 美国的首都是哪儿？

en: American children grow up hearing those words.
zh: 美国孩子是听着这些话长大的。

en: I don't think I can cut in working in America.
zh: 我觉得我应付不来在美国工作。

en: American industry makes various attempts to find and encourage brilliant students from abroad.
zh: 美国工业界想方设法寻找并鼓励优秀的外国留学生。

en: Black people in America once said, "Give us freedom".
zh: 美国的黑人曾经说过：“给我们自由。”

en: The American people elected Mr. Clinton President.
zh: 美国人民选了克林顿先生当总统。

en: Many American high-school students do not know that the Civil War took place between 1861 and 1865.
zh: 很多美国高中生都不知道南北战争是在1861年到1865年间发生的。

en: The American police are in blue uniforms.
zh: 美国警察穿的是蓝色制服。

en: U.S. companies are working to find a niche in the Japanese economy.
zh: 美国公司正努力在日本经济中寻找一席之地。

en: American students are falling behind in math.
zh: 美国学生的数学水平正在退步。

en: Many American students work their way through the university.
zh: 很多美国学生靠半工半读完成大学学业。

en: Athletic boys are popular with girls in American schools.
zh: 在美国学校里，爱运动的男生很受女生欢迎。

en: I've made up my mind to work for a company in the States.
zh: 我已经决定好去美国的某家公司工作了。

en: American songs were on the air.
zh: 电台里正在播放美国歌曲。

en: The American home does away with most housework by using machines.
zh: 美国人家里大都用机器来处理家务。

en: It was dark in the American house.
zh: 那栋美国房子里当时很黑。

en: How does America impress you?
zh: 你对美国印象如何？

en: I saw an American musical.
zh: 我看了一部美国音乐剧。

en: In U.S. bakeries, a "baker's dozen" is 13, not 12.
zh: 在美国的面包店里，“一打”指的是13个，而不是12个。

en: American news stories always refer to "The Japanese" no matter who is being talked about.
zh: 美国的各种新闻不管在说谁，总是通称为“日本人”。

en: American senior citizens are comparatively well-off.
zh: 美国的退休老人生活相对比较富裕。

en: If you decide to come to America, please let me know as soon as possible.
zh: 如果你决定来美国，请尽早让我知道。

en: I wonder what has become of him after he went to America.
zh: 我在想他去了美国之后过得怎么样了。

en: You have to cross the ocean to get to America.
zh: 去美国得跨过大洋。

en: He told me he was going to America.
zh: 他告诉我他要去美国。

en: There are many races in the United States.
zh: 美国有很多个种族。

en: America has an elaborate system of constitutional checks and balances.
zh: 美国有一套严密的宪法制衡机制。

en: Several races live together in America.
zh: 美国有好几个种族杂居。

en: There are fifty states in America.
zh: 美国有五十个州。

en: Laws to prevent computer crimes were enacted in the USA.
zh: 美国颁布了预防计算机犯罪的法律。

en: I had many problems during my visit to the U.S., but overall, I had a good time.
zh: 我在美国期间遇到了不少问题，但总的来说，我过得很愉快。

en: It would have been better if you had stayed in America.
zh: 你要是留在美国就好了。

en: I want to stay in America for a few years.
zh: 我想在美国待几年。

en: In America, rice can be bought for a fifth of what it costs in Japan.
zh: 在美国，买大米的钱只要日本的五分之一。

en: The joint-venture between the American and Japanese companies fell through.
zh: 那家美国公司和日本公司的合资经营告吹了。

en: I'm looking forward to touring bookstores in the US.
zh: 我很期待去逛逛美国的书店。

en: In America cars drive on the right side of the road.
zh: 在美国，车都是靠右开的。

en: What is the most popular sport in America?
zh: 美国最受欢迎的运动是什么？

en: In America, scores of free agents switch teams every year.
zh: 在美国，每年都有许多自由球员更换球队。

en: In the U.S., it is common to give a present, such as glasses or a coffee-maker, to the bride at weddings.
zh: 在美国，婚礼上送新娘像杯子或咖啡机之类的礼物很普遍。

en: In the U.S., part of the application process to universities usually includes an essay on "Why I want to go to university."
zh: 在美国，申请大学的流程通常包括写一篇题为《我为什么要上大学》的短文。

en: Many couples in America both work to make ends meet.
zh: 在美国，很多夫妻为了维持生计都得一起工作。

en: In America, many people have fences around their homes.
zh: 在美国，很多人的房子周围都有栅栏。
